title: Anabolic Steroids
desc:
Post 634
- Gain 3 Muscle. However, your next 2 turns are skipped.
- Alternatively you may instead choose to throw away this card, staying natty.
- Muscle stacks act as a shield which regenerates each time your turn begins. (Whenever you are forced to draw cards, you instead lose as much shield as you can before drawing cards.)
